author: andyc
msg: Fixed bug in load() that wasn't setting the count correctly in
the case where no characters were able to be loaded.

author: andyc
msg: Check for invalid character in scanComment.

author: andyc
msg: 1) Fixed bug in scanData that would hang when the position
was equal to the count - the delimiter length + 1. Now
the scanData method will scan all the way to the end of
the buffer until it discovered the start of the delimiter
at the end of the buffer.
2) Fixed bug in scanChar that was advancing too far into the
buffer when the \r\n pair was at the boundary of the buffer.
